column1: Lou Malnati's Pizzeria////Seems that visitors in Chicago go for Lou Malnati's and Giordano's for their deep dish fix. Admittedly I'm not big on deep dish
column2: but thankfully Lou does thin crust pizzas and amazing salads too. This location is a super crowded one so expect to wait at least half an hour for dinner. There are 2 floors with lots of tables and they have a nice waitlisting system: you get text updates when your table is ready and you can order before being seated!
